item.title: PYTHON 作业2
item.description: HOMEWORK 尽量尝试用多种方法计算。 复习知识点： While循环、if语句、跳转语句

item.title: ABOUT WALIMAKER
item.description: 全国素质教育推广中心战略合作伙伴国家社科基金重点课题拟写单位国家教育部及科协赛事提供方中国电子学会考级认证战略合作伙伴WALIMAKER 瓦力工厂® 是及集机器人课程技术研发、产品制造、赛事运营于一体的全产业链企业。截止2019年底，在全国30个省市布局近500家编程学习中心。为全国超过1000所公立学校，提供编程整体解决方案。Emphasis WALIMAKER PROVIDE A TOTAL SOLUTION FOR MORE THEN 1000 PUBLIC SCHOOLS.

item.title: Learning Empowers Your Future
item.description: Everything your little one needs to begin their coding adventure.

item.title: C++
item.description: What does C++ Programming Language mean? C++ is a general-purpose object-oriented programming (OOP) language, developed by Bjarne Stroustrup, and is an extension of the C language.

item.title: Coding Robots for Kids
item.description: MCU Robots With a profound background of STEAM education, Walimaker provides innovative educational robots that enables students to create, program, with collaborative STEAM activities, Walimaker helps students learn core-subjects and develop 21st-century skills like problem-solving, critical-thinking, and collaboration in a fun and engaging way.

item.title: Learning Empowers Your Future
item.description: You’re here because you want the best And we know it

item.title: Machine Vision
item.description: Machine Vision with Python The OpenMV project is about creating low-cost, extensible, Python powered, machine vision modules and aims at becoming the “Arduino of Machine Vision“.

item.title: MciroPython
item.description: MicroPython @WALIMAKER MicroPython is a lean and efficient implementation of the Python 3 programming language that includes a small subset of the Python standard library and is optimised to run on microcontrollers and in constrained environments.

item.title: Python For Kids
item.description: Python For kids We begin with the basics of how to install Python and write simple commands.

item.title: Scratch
item.description: About Scratch ● Scratch is a free programming language and online community where you can create your own interactive stories, games, and animations.

item.title: Why TensorFlow
item.description: Hi TensorFlow TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning.
